properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 24 at 4:28PM AKST until January 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE
SATURDAY NIGHT FOR HAINES BOROUGH AND THE HAINES HIGHWAY...

* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory tonight, snow expected.
Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. For the Winter Storm
Watch Saturday night, heavy snow possible. Total snow
accumulations of 7 to 9 inches possible.

* WHERE...Haines Borough and Lynn Canal.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening
to 6 AM AKST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from
Saturday evening through late Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially after
recent heavy snowfall.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will increase this evening,
then diminish Saturday morning. Another front will bring more
heavy snow to the watch area beginning Saturday evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY FOR THE HAINES BOROUGH AND HAINES HIGHWAY
